title: Artificial Intelligence Sparks Debate at COP30 Climate Talks in Brazil
description: Artificial Intelligence Sparks Debate at COP30 Climate Talks in Brazil
content:
BELEM, Brazil (AP) — At the U.N. climate talks in Brazil, artificial intelligence is being cast as both a hero worthy of praise and a villain that needs policing.

title: These Massive CA Data Centers Are Sitting Empty - And It Could Stay That Way For Years
description: Artificial Intelligence demands enormous amounts of electricity, and for some new datacenter developments, the supply doesn't yet exist.
content: The NVIDIA headquarters is a gleaming, polygonal atrium at the heart of Santa Clara, California. Its campus stretches across the San Tomas Expressway, its physical footprint dwarfed only by its economic one. As of this writing, it has a market cap of... [4786 chars]

title: Nvidia is no longer the most popular AI trade. Can it regain its crown?
description: Nvidia reports earnings Wednesday, and this time it's different: The chipmaker is no longer the hottest artificial intelligence trade on Wall Street.
content: Nvidia reports earnings on Wednesday, and this time it's different for one reason: The chipmaker is no longer the hottest artificial intelligence trade on Wall Street. The stock, while it's still up nearly 39% this year, is lagging fellow semiconduct... [1706 chars]

title: ‘Don’t rely on AI blindly, it is prone to make errors’: Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s new warning
description: In a BBC interview, Pichai urged users to approach artificial intelligence with scepticism, emphasising that even cutting-edge tools like Google's Gemini can make mistakes.
content:
At a time when AI-generated responses has made inroads every day tasks, be it office emails, or college assignments, Sundar Pichai, CEO of Google’s parent company, has sounded an alarm against relying on the technology “blindly”.
In a BBC interview, ... [1837 chars]

title: Wall Street wobble shows fundamentals still matter
description: Warnings about Wall Street's excessive optimism, concentration risk, and frothy valuations have fallen on deaf ears for most of this year, leaving market-watchers wondering what, if anything, will cool the tech and artificial intelligence frenzy.

title: Santa Clara data centers are bought by Texas firm for $90 million-plus
description: A company from Texas has paid well over $90 million to buy a pair of data centers in Santa Clara in a sign that investors still hunger for these sites amid the artificial intelligence boom.
content:
SANTA CLARA — A Texas company has paid well over $90 million to buy a pair of data centers in Santa Clara in a sign that investors still hunger for these sites amid the artificial intelligence boom.

title: World shares sink
description: Wall Street is poised to open with more losses Tuesday as artificial-intelligence -related shares continued to drag markets lower.
content:

title: Jim Cramer Tells Sundar Pichai To Stop 'Spending Irrationally' On AI, Calls Apple 'A Winner'
